snippet: KALLETT--Calvin. The Board of Trustees and staff of Educational Alliance mourn the passing of Calvin Kallett, father of longtime Trustee Tricia Kallett. We offer our sincere condolences to Tricia and her family. Erica Tishman, Chairman of the Boar...
lead_paragraph: KALLETT--Calvin. The Board of Trustees and staff of Educational Alliance mourn the passing of Calvin Kallett, father of longtime Trustee Tricia Kallett. We offer our sincere condolences to Tricia and her family. Erica Tishman, Chairman of the Board Alan van Capelle, President and CEO 1/3
